name: RESI Hackathon
content: Technology and the emergence of increasingly intergenerational, multi-tenure and mixed-use schemes present a real opportunity to reconnect and integrate them with their wider communities and to create smart-home or communication solutions that not only address their specific need's but make everyone's life easier. Your opportunity to tackle this global issue is at the RESI Hackathon on the 11-12 September in Wales! The hackathon is an official side event of the RESI Convention 2019\. Joining this year's hackathon as the project partner is Auriens, who are eager to find solutions that can socially engage ater lifers and bring people together from across all generations! Time: 3:00 pm to 7:30 pm Venue Details: Celtic Manor Resort, Coldra Woods, The Usk Valley, Caerleon, NP18 1HQ, United Kingdom
